===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[way]]; [[means]]
#: {{zh-x|我 現在 沒有 辦法 工作。|There's no '''way''' I can work now.}}
#: {{zh-x|她 開始 在 想 另 一 個 辦法 保護 她 女兒 的 安全。|She had begun thinking of another '''way''' to ensure her daughter's safety.}}

====Usage notes====
In Min Nan, this term tends to be used more often in a positive sense. Whereas in Mandarin, one says {{zh-l|沒辦法|there is no way}}, in Min Nan, one would usually say {{zh-l|無法度|bô-hoat-tō͘}}.
